result.title: Judging Locally with Test Datas
result.content: I can judge my code if I have the judge datas with me in Linux by keeping all *.in, *.out and main.cpp code file in one folder and run this command in the terminal. But how can I do this type of things in Windows, in CMD or something like this? Is there any equivalent code for the above one? If anyone knows, please share. :D
